section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: A'isha reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) having said:I saw you in a dream for three nights when an angel brought you to me in a silk cloth and he said: Here is your wife, and when I removed (the cloth) from your face, lo, it was yourself, so I said: If this is from Allah, let Him carry it out
